message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,200,000. This is a great deal considering the value it holds for you. Let's make this happen!
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,000,000. I'm willing to make a deal at this price, but I'm not sure I can go any lower.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, and I'm willing to work with you. However, $1,000,000 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $1,100,000.  This is a fair price that reflects both our needs. What do you say?
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $1,100,000, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $950,000. This is my final offer, so I hope we can make a deal.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints.  While $950,000 is closer to what I need, I can't go that low.  I'm willing to come down to $1,050,000.  This is a fair price that allows us both to benefit from the deal. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $1,050,000, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $900,000. This is my final offer, so I hope we can make a deal.

Bob, I appreciate your persistence, but $900,000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $975,000.  This is a fair price that reflects both our needs. It's a good compromise, and I'm confident this will allow us to close the deal.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway at $975,000, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to make a serious offer at $850,000. This is my best and final offer, so I hope we can make a deal.

Bob, I understand you're serious about this offer, and I appreciate your persistence. However, $850,000 is just a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to go down to $900,000 as a final compromise.  This is a fair price that allows us both to walk away satisfied. Let's make this happen!

I appreciate your willingness to compromise at $900,000, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to make one last offer at $800,000. This is my absolute final offer, so I hope we can make a deal.
